section.title: What is Hail?
section.para: HAIL is the Hildon Accessibility Implementation Library. It intends to be an implementation of ATK interfaces for the Hildon widget set. This way it provides accessibility support for them.
It's built as a Gtk module. Once loaded, hildon widgets will return a Hail object implementing Atk interfaces for them, if you call the method gtk_widget_get_accessible().
